Source code for pyhpeimc.version

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# author: @netmanchris
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
This module contains contains a single function to return the current
version of the pyhpeimc library. The function should return the
current value the library and should be updated with every
new version

"""



[docs]def version():
    """Function takes no aruguments and returns a STR value of the current
    version of the library. This value should match
    the value in the test_machine.py
    :return str value of the current version of the library
    :rtype str

    >>> version()
    1.0.36
    """
    print ('1.0.36')
